channel.title: Help

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“Vexillum, post:3, topic:430921”][quote author=whackatre link=topic=533598.msg3900748#msg3900748 date=1327742646]

c.buttonTimer = 1;
int actionButtonId = Misc.hexToInt(c.getInStream().buffer, 0, packetSize); 
if (c.playerRights > 1)            
     c.sendMessage("@blu@Actionbutton: " + actionButtonId + " Fight mode: " + c.fightMode + " Dialogue action: " + c.dialogueAction);

Change playerRights to whatever it is called in your server.
[/quote]

What does it say exactly. Does it mean Moderator+ can see it or what?[/quote]

Admin+.

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @jaruanna jaruanna
item.description:
@jaruanna wrote:

the if (c.playerRights >= 1) { means that if the player rights, is greater than or equal to 1 then send the message. player rights 1 is mod and player rights 2 isadmin an player rights 3 is owner.

Read full topic

Change playerRights to whatever it is called in your server.[/quote]

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Vexillum Vexillum
item.description:
@Vexillum wrote:

Ok so, I know I can probably just remove this but I still want this to show up for owners just incase I may need it.

Every time I or any players click on something in my server it shows like "Actionbutton: Fight mode: dialogue action: " and I only want this to be for owners. I found the code in Clickingbuttons.java so here it is:

c.buttonTimer = 1; int actionButtonId = Misc.hexToInt(c.getInStream().buffer, 0, packetSize); c.sendMessage("@blu@Actionbutton: " + actionButtonId + " Fight mode: " + c.fightMode + " Dialogue action: " + c.dialogueAction);

What would I do to make it so Admins + only see this? Also, I’m new to Java sort of so is this whole code a method or what?

Thanks.

Read full topic
